name: Skedaddle
description: Learn how to successfully run while making qua-zillion mistakes. Run through 10 procedurally generated chapters. Die a lot. Buy upgrades. Unlock 5 characters with special abilities. Most importantly: keep your fingers healthy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128mb DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2.5 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256mb DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space
